Key: Whoa, whoa, whoa! I'm going to be late!
Hm?

(I hear a voice coming from the staircase.
Could it be...?)
Hawawa, yikes!
Whoa!

(I knew it! I caught the girl as she sprinted
at a blinding speed.)

(However, her force was more than I anticipated,
and I toppled onto my back.)
I-I'm sorry! I was in a hurry and...!
No, I was spacing out too. Sorry.

(She really took me out. That was quite
the dash tackle for such a small girl.)
Um. Are you my senpai?
I'm a second year. I could be.
(This girl's probably a first year.)

Oh, but if you're a second year, then we're
the same.
Hm? ...Really?

Oh, this is no good! I'm keeping Mily-san
waiting! E-Excuse me!

Hey, wait! It's dangerous if you don't look
ahead!
Ah! I-I'm sorry～!

(She keeps running into people. Gotta pay
more attention.)

(Hm. Still, who was she? I feel like I've
seen her, but I don't recognize her...)
